name: Bionic Raider
description:
Action platformer originally developed in 2008 during my first semester in Game Development graduate school, then picked up again in 2012 and polished somewhat.

Mechanics include melee combat, projectile deflection, bombs, shields and stealth, all explained via ingame tutorials. The one stage presented is rather large and includes many branching paths, as well as 3 types of enemies preventing the player's advance. A boss was supposed to appear in the final screen, but I never got around to implementing it.

Art made by me in MS Paint, trying to emulate 8-bit era graphics. All of it is original, except for the heroine, who I drew in the image of Waya Hime, my favorite character from the 80's game "Bravoman" (originally a cyborg ninja, hence the game's title).

Controls:

- Right and Left arrow keys to move

- Up arrow key to jump

- Z key to attack

- X key to throw explosive (requires a bomb)

- S key to activate stealth (requires a syringe)
